question.description: Write a function called "fact" which takes a single integer argument (say "n") and returns the factorial of the number. For example fact(3) -> 6
Create a simple function called "sqr" which takes a single argument and returns the square of the argument For example sqr(3) -> 9.
question.test: import math assert sqr(3) == 9 assert abs(sqr(math.sqrt(2)) - 2.0) < 1e-14
